name: Homesick (itch) (XamG0, Sven de Wit, Linda Effinger)
name_original: Homesick (itch) (XamG0, Sven de Wit, Linda Effinger)
description:
Homesick is a project for O2A2 2022 jam, meaning it may use Only One of Any Asset and it must be less than 1000 words.

  • Format: Visual Novel 
  • Length: 850 words
  • Language: English
  • Platform: Windows, Mac, Browser

TEAM

  • Sven de Wit
  • Tim Wondergem
  • Max Wognum
  • Linda Effinger
